LanguageData.OilDrilling.label: Drill for oil
LanguageData.DeepOilWells.label: Deep Wells
LanguageData.DeepOilWells.description: Drill deeper wells to access new larger oil reservoirs.
LanguageData.ChemfuelRefining.label: Chemfuel Refining
LanguageData.ChemfuelRefining.description: Refine crude oil into chemfuel to be stored in chemfuel tanks.
LanguageData.NeutroamineProduction.label: Neutroamine
LanguageData.NeutroamineProduction.description: Produce Neutroamine from stored chemfuel, used for making medicine
LanguageData.SynthyleneProduction.label: Synthylene
LanguageData.SynthyleneProduction.description: Produce the generic building material synthylene with a selection of colours from stored chemfuel
LanguageData.Napalm.label: Napalm
LanguageData.Napalm.description: Highly flammable sticky jelly used in incendiary bombs, consisting of chemfuel thickened with synthylene
LanguageData.ArtificialFloors.label: Artificial Flooring
LanguageData.SynthyleneComponents.label: Synthylene Components
LanguageData.SynthyleneComponents.description: Stretch out your steel reserves by making components using synthylene and steel
LanguageData.SynthyleneAdvComponents.label: Advanced Synthylene Components
LanguageData.SynthyleneAdvComponents.description: Stretch out your steel reserves by making advanced components using synthylene
LanguageData.SynthreadProduction.label: Synthread
LanguageData.SynthamideProduction.label: Synthamide
LanguageData.SynthamideProduction.description: Produce Synthamide, Synthamide fibers are heat-resistant and strong synthetic fibers, they can be used for creating very durable clothing.
LanguageData.SynthamideCompositeProduction.label: Synthamide Composite
LanguageData.SynthamideCompositeProduction.descriptio: Produce Synthamide Composite, a high strength light weight fire resistant spacer tech composite material, made of a synthylene matrix reinforced with synthamide fibres
LanguageData.SynthamideCompositeProduction.discovered: You can now produce Synthamide composite! first craft uncured composite at a fabrication bench, construct an autoclave, then load uncured composite into the autoclave to cure it.
LanguageData.PlasteelProduction.label: Plasteel
LanguageData.PlasteelProduction.description: Discover the secrets of making Plasteel
LanguageData.PlasteelProduction.discoveredLetterText: You can now produce Plasteel! craft uncured Plasteel at a fabrication bench, construct an autoclave, then set the autoclave to plasteel curing mode.
LanguageData.HyperweaveProduction.label: Hyperweave
LanguageData.HyperweaveProduction.description: Discover the secrets of making Hyperweave
LanguageData.CE_FsxProduction.label: FSX Refining
LanguageData.CE_FsxProduction.description: Produce FSX from stored chemfuel, used for making explosives and specialty ammunition.
